resources.string:
" * This App is for free and provides good information about pokemon in the gaming world.
* Learn more about different pokemon types, their weakness and evolution cycle before battling the gyms.
* Very Simple Design, UI with faster access and greater performance.
* Frequent and important updates keep your app experience amazing.
* This app is designed and developed to enhance my android knowledge and experience.
* All the images are provided by Serbii.
* This app is not associated or affiliated to ©Niantic or ©PokemonGo and all information available here is unofficial.
* Please contact me if you need source code or explanation of how this app is implemented. "
